					<div id="MainContent">
						
						
	
			<h1 class="softpad"><b><center><font size="4">Granby Recreation</b></font></center></h1>
			<p><p>The Granby Recreation Dept is proud to provide the Town of Granby with our activity registration system and website. To get started please <a href="../../../info/household/account_check.aspx"><strong><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Create an Account</span></strong></a> with all your household information. The data provided; emergency contacts, allergies info and more, will help us better serve you. This info will also automatically fill out your registration forms. <br /><br />When you&rsquo;re ready to complete a registration form for <a href="../../../info/activities"><strong><span style="text-decoration: underline;">activities</span></strong></a> be sure to review the <a href="../../../info/tutorial"><strong><span style="text-decoration: underline;">How to Register for an Activity</span></strong></a> page.<br /><br /></p>
<center><strong>Contact Info</strong><br /><span style="color: gray;">Contact the Office:</span> <a href="mailto:recreation@granby-ct.gov">Granby Recreation</a><br /><span style="color: gray;">Phone:</span> 860-653-8947<br /><span style="color: gray;">Office Hours:</span> <br />Monday-Friday, 9-4PM or by appt.<br /><br /><strong><span style="color: red; font-size: medium;">ONLINE CREDIT CARD PAYMENT IS NOW AVAILABLE!</span></strong><br /><br /><br /></center></p>
		

						

						
					</div>
					<div id="Community">

						<!--Start Text Size2-->
						<script src="/info/includes/jquery.cookie.js"></script>
						<script>
							$(document).ready(function() {
								var size = $('#frmMain').css('font-size');

								var size2 = $.cookie("textSize2");
								if (size2) {
									//alert(size2);
									$('#frmMain').css('font-size', parseInt(size2));
								}

								$("#resetFont").click(function(){
									$('#frmMain').css('font-size', size);
									$.cookie("textSize2", parseInt(size), { path: '/'});
									return false;
								});

								$("#increaseFont").click(function() {
									var size = $('#frmMain').css('font-size');
									if (parseInt(size) < 22) {
										$('#frmMain').css('font-size', parseInt(size)+2);
										$.cookie("textSize2", parseInt(size)+2, { path: '/'});
									}
									else {
										$('#frmMain').css('font-size', parseInt(size));
									}
									return false;
								});

								$("#decreaseFont").click(function() {
									var size = $('#frmMain').css('font-size');
									if (parseInt(size) > 12) {
										$('#frmMain').css('font-size', parseInt(size)-2);
										$.cookie("textSize2", parseInt(size)-2, { path: '/'});
									}
									else {
										$('#frmMain').css('font-size', parseInt(size));
									}
									return false;
								});
							});
						</script>
						<div style="position: relative;"><br />
							<a id="increaseFont" style="cursor: pointer;">Larger Text</a> |
							<a id="decreaseFont" style="cursor: pointer;">Smaller Text</a> |
							<a id="resetFont" style="cursor: pointer;">Reset</a>
						</div>
						<!--End Text Size-->
						<br /><br />
